segment.source: Wireless network management (Surface Hub)
segment.target: Wireless network management (Surface Hub)

segment.source: Microsoft Surface Hub offers two options for network connectivity to your corporate network and Internet wireless, and wired.
segment.target: Microsoft Surface Hub offers two options for network connectivity to your corporate network and Internet wireless, and wired.

segment.source: While both provide network access, we recommend you use a wired connection.
segment.target: While both provide network access, we recommend you use a wired connection.

segment.source: Wireless network management (Surface Hub)
segment.target: Wireless network management (Surface Hub)

segment.source: Microsoft Surface Hub offers two options for network connectivity to your corporate network and Internet: wireless, and wired.
segment.target: Microsoft Surface Hub offers two options for network connectivity to your corporate network and Internet: wireless, and wired.

segment.source: While both provide network access, we recommend you use a wired connection.
segment.target: While both provide network access, we recommend you use a wired connection.

segment.source: Modifying, adding, or reviewing a network connection
segment.target: Modifying, adding, or reviewing a network connection

segment.source: If a wired network connection is not available, the Surface Hub can use a wireless network for internet access.
segment.target: If a wired network connection is not available, the Surface Hub can use a wireless network for internet access.

segment.source: A properly connected and configured Wi-Fi access point must be available and within range of the Surface Hub.
segment.target: A properly connected and configured Wi-Fi access point must be available and within range of the Surface Hub.

segment.source: Choose a wireless access point
segment.target: Choose a wireless access point

segment.source: On the Surface Hub, open Settings and enter your admin credentials.
segment.target: On the Surface Hub, open Settings and enter your admin credentials.

segment.source: Click System, and then click Network & Internet.
segment.target: Click System, and then click Network & Internet.

segment.source: Under Wi-Fi, choose an access point.
segment.target: Under Wi-Fi, choose an access point.

segment.source: If you want Surface Hub to automatically connect to this access point, click Connect automatically.
segment.target: If you want Surface Hub to automatically connect to this access point, click Connect automatically.

segment.source: Click Connect.
segment.target: Click Connect.

segment.source: If the network is secured, you'll be asked to enter the security key.
segment.target: If the network is secured, you'll be asked to enter the security key.

segment.source: Click Next to connect.
segment.target: Click Next to connect.

segment.source: Review wireless settings
segment.target: Review wireless settings

segment.source: On the Surface Hub, open Settings and enter your admin credentials.
segment.target: On the Surface Hub, open Settings and enter your admin credentials.

segment.source: Click System, click Network & Internet, then Wi-Fi, and then click Advanced options.
segment.target: Click System, click Network & Internet, then Wi-Fi, and then click Advanced options.

segment.source: The system will show you the properties for the wireless network connection.
segment.target: The system will show you the properties for the wireless network connection.

segment.source: Review wired settings
segment.target: Review wired settings

segment.source: On the Surface Hub, open Settings and enter your admin credentials.
segment.target: On the Surface Hub, open Settings and enter your admin credentials.

segment.source: Click System, click Network & Internet, then click on the network under Ethernet.
segment.target: Click System, click Network & Internet, then click on the network under Ethernet.

segment.source: The system will show you the properties for the wired network connection.
segment.target: The system will show you the properties for the wired network connection.

segment.target: Related topics

segment.target: Manage Microsoft Surface Hub
